name: Timekeeper (Three Raccoons, Sfapun, Jaime Alonso, Asheeee, Ant Vanden, Flat White Canvas, TheKaoser)
name_original: Timekeeper (Three Raccoons, Sfapun, Jaime Alonso, Asheeee, Ant Vanden, Flat White Canvas, TheKaoser)
description:
Duration without beginning or end is time.
Existence without a place to reside is reality. 
Forward progression without backtracking is being.

You are Timekeeper. You must keep the gears of time moving forward by running against its current but along its flow. You must avoid the obstacles by changing your way but without changing your path. You must keep time moving eternally into entropy lest what has always been becomes what once was.

Walk, Jump and Shift from one gear to the next as chaos becomes. 

Your direction is forward.

Controls

Press UP ARROW to jump over
Press DOWN ARROW to shift under

Jump to the centre of the Clocks to teleport to the next gear.

The browser build of this game is currently not working in itch.io, please play the downloadable version for now
